events.message: I placed an order last week and received the wrong item. I would like to request a refund since this product does not meet my expectations.
The system has identified the issue reported by the customer as related to a refund request due to incorrect delivery.
An agent has been assigned to handle the case concerning the refund request for the incorrect item received.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear you received the wrong item. I’d be happy to assist you with the refund process.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can verify and proceed with the refund?
Sure, my order number is 12345XYZ. I have attached a photo of the item that was delivered instead of what I ordered.
Thank you for the details. We will process your refund within 5 business days and provide a prepaid label to return the incorrect product.
Thanks for the quick response. I appreciate the refund and return label offer. Looking forward to resolving this smoothly.
The refund has been initiated, and a return shipping label has been sent to your email to complete the process.
We wanted to check in and ensure you received the refund and had no further issues with your order. Please let us know if you need any more help.
Since your refund has been completed and the issue resolved, we are closing this case. Thank you for your patience and understanding.
